server.facades

Interface IGameFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyGameFacade, GameFacade

    public interface IGameFacade
    The Interface IGameFacade.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandResponse getCommands(java.lang.String json, UserAttributes ua)
      Gets the list of commands that have been executed for the specified game.
      CommandResponse getGameModel(java.lang.String json, UserAttributes ua)
      Gets the game model that needs to be sent to the client for gameplay.
      CommandResponse reset(java.lang.String json, UserAttributes ua)
      Resets the game model to the create game state.
      CommandResponse runCommands(java.lang.String json, UserAttributes ua)
      Run commands that are in the format that the getCommands endpoint returns.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommands

        CommandResponse getCommands(java.lang.String json,
                          UserAttributes ua)
        Gets the list of commands that have been executed for the specified game.
        Parameters:
        json - the json indicating which game to get the commands for
        ua - the user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        the commands execuded in this game

      • runCommands

        CommandResponse runCommands(java.lang.String json,
                          UserAttributes ua)
        Run commands that are in the format that the getCommands endpoint returns. Allows replaying of events.
        Parameters:
        json - a json array of commands to execute
        ua - the user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        the string "Successful" or an error

      • reset

        CommandResponse reset(java.lang.String json,
                    UserAttributes ua)
        Resets the game model to the create game state.
        Parameters:
        json - the json indicating which game id
        ua - the user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        the string "Successful"

      • getGameModel

        CommandResponse getGameModel(java.lang.String json,
                           UserAttributes ua)
        Gets the game model that needs to be sent to the client for gameplay.
        Parameters:
        json - the json representing the game model version
        ua - the user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        the game model as a json string
